author: hwright
msg: More purging of underscores: Nounify MERGE_INFO in the test suite.

author: hwright
msg: Second part of 'blame -g' rework, followup to r29059.  Properly iterate over
merged revisions, and store them for later transmission.  This fixes 'blame -g'
functionality, and the corresponding tests are now passing.
(find_interesting_revisions): If we are including merged revisions, get
iterative search to add merged revisions to the merged_path_revisions array.
(send_path_revision): Update reference to the member of path_revision.
find_merged_revisions().  Fix sort order when sending revisions.
(blame_merge_out_of_range): Update expected output, based upon new 'blame -g'
(test_list): Mark blame_merge_info and blame_merge_out_of_range as passing.

author: arfrever
msg: (svn_cl__merge): Fix a typo in a message.
